description: Try our easy to follow Rack Of Lamb With Flageolet Beans And Herbs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ lamb,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Rack Of Lamb With Flageolet Beans And Herbs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful fresh mint leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C (Gas 6). Smother the lamb with the oil, sprinkle over the rosemary, and season well with salt and black pepper. Sit the rack in a roasting tin and put in the oven to roast for 40 minutes, or longer if you like your meat well done.

Remove the lamb from the tin and keep warm (covered with foil) while you prepare the beans. Sit the roasting tin on the hob over a medium to high heat, add the stock, and bring to the boil. Reduce to a simmer, stir in the redcurrant jelly until dissolved, then stir through the flageolet beans and simmer gently for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir through the mint.
Slice the rack into 8 cutlets and serve with the beans and some minted new potatoes.
